metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3733 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
There's a flaw in urllib's AbstractBasicAuthHandler class. An attacker whocontrols a malicious HTTP server that an HTTP client (such as web browser)connects to, could trigger a Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDOS)during an authentication request with a specially crafted payload that issent by the server to the client. The greatest threat that this flaw posesis to application availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python3.8 - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
libpython3.8 - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
libpython3.8-minimal - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
libpython3.8-stdlib - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
libpython3.8-testsuite - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
python3.8 - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
python3.8-examples - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
python3.8-minimal - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
python3.8-venv - 3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2
No subscription required

idle-python3.7 - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
libpython3.7 - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
libpython3.7-minimal - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
libpython3.7-stdlib - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
libpython3.7-testsuite - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
python3.7 - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
python3.7-examples - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
python3.7-minimal - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
python3.7-venv - 3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2
No subscription required

idle-python3.6 - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
libpython3.6 - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
libpython3.6-minimal - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
libpython3.6-stdlib - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
libpython3.6-testsuite - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
python3.6 - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
python3.6-examples - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
python3.6-minimal - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
python3.6-venv - 3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python3.8 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.8.0-3ubuntu1~18.04.2').
python3.7 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.5-2ubuntu1~18.04.2').
python3.6 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.6').
